Verses: 1 edhomilum Adhilulla Posraa Pattanaththilumirundhu, Saayantheerndha Vasthirangaludaiyavaraagavum, Magaththuvamaai Uduththirukkiravaraagavum, Thamadhu Magaththaana Vallamaiyile Ezhundharulinavaraagavum Varugira Ivar Yaar? Needhiyaaip Pesi Ratchikka Vallavaraagiya Naandhaane.
2 ummudaiya Uduppu Sivappaagavum, Ummudaiya Vasthirangal Aalaiyai Midhikkiravan Vasthirangalpolavum Irukkiradhenna?

3 naan Oruvanaai Aalaiyai Midhiththen; Janangalil Oruvanum Ennodirundhadhillai, Naan En Kobaththile Avargalai Midhiththu, En Ukkiraththile Avargalai Nasukkippotten; Adhinaal Avargal Raththam En Vasthirangalinmel Theriththadhu, En Uduppaiyellaam Karaippaduththikkonden.
4 needhiyai Sarikkattum Naal En Manadhilirundhadhu; Ennudaiyavargalai Meetkum Varusham Vandhadhu.
5 naan Paarththen, Thunaiseyvaar Oruvarumillai; Thaanguvaar Oruvarumillai Endru Aachchariyappatten; Appozhudhu En Buyame Enakku Ratchippaagi, En Ukkirame Ennaith Thaangitru.
6 naan En Kobaththile Janangalai Midhiththu, En Ukkiraththile Avargalai Veriyaakki, Avargal Saaraththaith Tharaiyile Irangappanninen.

7 karththar Engalukku Seydharulina Ellaavatrirkum Thakkadhaagavum Avar Thammudaiya Irakkangalinpadiyum Thammudaiya Thiralaana Dhayavugalinpadiyum, Isravel Vamsaththukku Seydha Magaa Nanmaikkuththakkadhaagavum, Karththarudaiya Kiriyaigalaiyum, Karththarudaiya Thudhigalaiyum Prasthaabampannuven.
8 avargal En Jananthaanendrum, Avargal Vanjanaiseyyaadhirukkum Pillaigalendrum Solli Avargalukku Ratchagaraanaar.

9 avargaludaiya Ellaa Nerukkaththilum Avar Nerukkappattaar; Avarudaiya Samugaththin Thoodhanaanavar Avargalai Ratchiththaar; Avar Thamadhu Anbinimiththamum, Thamadhu Paridhaabaththinimiththamum Avargalai Meettu, Poorvanaatkalilellaam Avargalaith Thookki Sumandhuvandhaar.
10 avargalo Kalagampanni, Avarudaiya Parisuththa Aaviyai Visanappaduththinaargal; Adhinaal Avar Avargalukku Saththuruvaai Maari, Avare Avargalukku Virodhamaai Yuththampanninaar.

11 aagilum Avar Poorvanaatkalaiyum, Moseyaiyum, Thammudaiya Janaththaiyum Ninaivukoorndhaar; Aanaalum Avargalaiyum, Thamadhu Mandhaiyin Meyppanaiyum Samuththiraththilirundhu Erivarappanninavar Ippozhudhu Enge?

12 avargal Naduvile Thammudaiya Parisuththa Aaviyai Irukkak Kattalaiyittu, Moseyin Valadhukaiyaikkondu Avargalaith Thamadhu Magimaiyin Buyaththinaale Nadaththi, Thamakku Niththiyakeerththiyai Undaakka Avargalukku Munbaagath Thanneeraip Pilandhu,
13 oru Kudhirai Vanaandharaveliyile Nadakkiradhupola, Avargal Idaraadhapadikku Avargalai Aazhangalil Nadakkappanninavar Enge?

14 karththarudaiya Aaviyaanavar Avargalaip Pallaththaakkile Poi Irangugira Mirugajeevangalaippola Ilaippaarappanninaar; Ippadiye Dhevareer, Umakku Magimaiyulla Keerththiyai Undaakkumpadi Ummudaiya Janaththai Nadaththineer.

15 dhevareer Paralogaththilirundhu Kannokki, Parisuththamum Magimaiyumulla Ummudaiya Vaasasthalaththilirundhu Paarum, Ummudaiya Vairaakkiyamum, Ummudaiya Vallamaiyum Enge? Ummudaiya Ullaththin Kodhippaiyum, Ummudaiya Mana Urukkaththaiyum Enakku Munbaaga Adakkikkollugireero?

16 dhevareer Engal Pidhaavaayirukkireer; Aabiragaam Engalai Ariyaan, Isravelukku Naangal Ariyappattavargalumalla; Karththaave, Neer Engal Pidhaavum Engal Meetparumaayirukkireer; Idhu Poorvakaalamudhal Ummudaiya Naamam.

17 karththaave, Neer Engalai Ummudaiya Vazhigalaivittuth Thappippogappanni, Engal Irudhayaththai Umakku Bayappadaadhapadikkuk Kadinappaduththuvaanen? Ummudaiya Oozhiyakkaararinimiththamum, Ummudaiya Sudhandharamaana Koththirangalinimiththamum Thirumbiyarulum.
18 parisuththamulla Umadhu Janangal Konjak Kaalamaaththiram Adhai Sudhandhariththaargal; Engal Saththurukkal Ummudaiya Parisuththa Sthalaththai Midhiththuppottaargal.
19 naangale Ummudaiyavargal, Avargalai Orupozhudhum Neer Aandadhillai; Avargalukku Umadhu Naamam Tharikkappattadhumillai.
